knimeNode.name: File Upload
knimeNode.shortDescription: Quick Form node that allows uploading a file and exposing that uploaded file using a flow variable.

intro.p: Quick Form node that allows uploading a file and exposing that uploaded file using a flow variable. The value can also be controlled from a quick form (web port).

fullDescription.option: A descriptive label that will be shown in, for instance the web port.
Some lines of description that will be shown in the remote control form, for instance by means of a tooltip.
If the setting should be hidden in the wizard execution.
If the setting should be hidden in the sub node dialog.
Parameter identifier for external parameterization (e.g. batch execution).

A list of file extensions that is used as filter in the file browser (not only the one in the "Default File" option but also in a remote file browser), e.g. ".csv,.csv.gz" will filter for files ending with ".csv" or ".csv.gz". Leave empty to accept any file.
The file that will be used during design time, i.e. when no file is uploaded by means of the, e.g. KNIME WebPortal.

knimeNode.interactiveView: View containing the file upload component.

ports.outPort: Variable output the file path represented as variable.
